item.title: Ancient converter, need further help
item.dc:creator: @Y0_J0k3r Y0_J0k3r
item.description:
@Y0_J0k3r wrote:

if (objectID == 6552 && emotes == 0 || emotes == 1) { emotes = 2; updateRequired = true; setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); sendMessage("You convert to ancient magic."); } else if (objectID == 1738 && emotes == 2) { emotes = 0; updateRequired = true; setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); sendMessage("You convert to normal magic."); } else { stillgfx(199, absX, absY); }

So i got this code, everytime i click on the altar it converts to ancients or normal magic. But everytime I log out it goes back to normal magic, can anyone make it so it saves what magic you have when you log out. Thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2006, 09:43:05 AM[/size][hr]Anyone help?

Read full topic
